summary: Defines a Feast feature repository for driver data on Snowflake, declaring entities, Snowflake, push and request sources, feature views, and an on‑demand feature view that computes transformed conversion rate using helper functions.
business_intent: Provide a reusable feature store configuration that supplies driver‑related features (such as conversion rate and related metrics) to machine‑learning models, leveraging Snowflake for batch data and supporting real‑time updates.
